article.title: Success Stories - San Antonio U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about successful clients of the San Antonio U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
The Commercial Service (CS) helps thousands of businesses expand into new foreign markets. Here are just a few examples of what some South Texas firms have accomplished with our San Antonio U.S. Export Assistance Center's (USEAC) assistance.

Abrahammâ€‹

(International Artist from San Antonio, TX)

Abraham Mojica is an artist that has enchanted collectors from all over the world with his talent. CS San Antonio has provided Abraham with market research and intelligence that has assisted him to introduce his art to countries such as Japan, Germany, Belgium, Mexico, France, Australia, Canada & Argentina.
article.seometadatatitle: Success Stories - San Antonio U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about successful clients of the San Antonio U.S. Export Assistance Center.
